issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Wrong result when executing with tez

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Queries like these 
{code}
with sub1 as
(select aid, avalue from expod1 lateral view explode(av) avs as avalue ),
sub2 as
(select bid, bvalue from expod2 lateral view explode(bv) bvs as bvalue)
select sub1.aid, sub1.avalue, sub2.bvalue
from sub1,sub2
where sub1.aid=sub2.bid;
{code}

generates twice the number of rows in Tez when compared to MR.
fields.summary: Mapjoin with LateralViewJoin generates wrong plan in Tez

Also can we have this for 0.14.1?
[~hagleitn]/[~ashutoshc] Should this go into 0.14.1?
Committed to trunk
This is causing incorrect query results. Should go into 0.14.1.
Committed to branch.
The original patch doesn't actually work. The problem is that we still collect the mj during visiting the nodes. We need to clear that before bailing out of work generation.

failures are unrelated.
[~hagleitn] due to HIVE-8964 the latest ptest run won't actually test {{lvj_mapjoin.q}} if you've verified it works locally, I will enable that test after the latest patch is committed.
[~brocknoland] I have verified that lvj_mapjoin works locally. Thanks.
Last patch looks good to me. +1
Committed this patch to trunk. lvj_mapjoin.q ran successfully locally for me too. [~brocknoland] Can you reenable lvj_mapjoin.q test to see if it runs successfully now?

HIVE-8707 fixed ordering issues in hashmap between JDK8 vs older version. The test diff changes in .5 patch is not required for the branch. Attaching patch for the branch 0.14.1 which is same as Gunther's .5 patch but without test diff changes.
Committed patch with [~hagleitn]'s fix  to branch-0.14
[~brocknoland] I have committed this patch to trunk and branch-0.14.1. Please reopen this issue if lvj_mapjoin.q hangs again in test run.
I have just enabled the test. I will keep an eye on the tests.
Updating release version for jiras resolved in 1.0.0 .
This issue has been fixed in Apache Hive 1.0.0. If there is any issue with the fix, please open a new jira to address it.
